member.name: T:ObjImport.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ObjImport.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ObjImport.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ObjImport.ObjectHandler.Object3DHandler
member.summary: Manages 3D objects. Most importantly, creating them from *.obj files.

member.name: M:ObjImport.ObjectHandler.Object3DHandler.CreateMeshFromObj(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Model3DGroup from a given file as a .obj
member.returns: A new Model3DGroup based on the file.

member.name: M:ObjImport.ObjectHandler.SharedFileData.GetDataFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data from a file in a thread-safe way. This means it only reads an individual file once, then stores the file in memory for the rest of the application's lifetime. Threadsafe, so accessing from any thread, at any time, is okay.
member.param: The name of the file to be accessed.
member.returns: A list containing all of the file data.

member.name: M:ObjImport.ObjectHandler.SharedFileData.GetDataFromFileUnsafe(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data from a file in an unsafe context, without regard for the filenumber or whether the file is already locked by a different thread. As such should only be used for reading the save file. Provides the additional benefit of noticing when the file has changed. Should only be called from one thread.
member.param: The name of the file to be read from.
member.returns: A list containing all the lines of data in the file.

member.name: M:ObjImport.ObjectHandler.SharedFileData.WriteDataToFileUnsafe(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Writes data to a file without consideration of the need to check whether the filecode or file is open. Should not be used in any non-main thread threads.
member.param: The name of the file to read from
The data to write to the file
